plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 09-2322

                        TONY B. GASKINS,

                     Petitioner, Appellant,

                               v.

                        RONALD T. DUVAL,

                      Respondent, Appellee.


                          ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this Court issued on April 13, 2011 is
amended as follows:

     On page 23, line 22, "either is" should read "either it".
